title: Creation in Genesis 1 is God Building a Temple
description:
Commentary on the JBP Bib Series 2 on Genesis 1 and the Temple. 

From https://youtu.be/hdrLQ7DpiWs 

Jordan Peterson completely misses (understandably) that Genesis 1 is a temple text. What is the temple? How does it function? How does this theme work throughout the Bible?
